quest.name: Meekly Majestic
journal:
 Quest Sync
Kleon hopes to retain your company a while longer.

Kleon tells you of another concept due for evaluation, and asks that you remain at his side during the process. Follow after Alkaios to the place where the io roams.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

You join Alkaios at the spot where the io is usually found, but the creature is nowhere to be seen. At Maira's suggestion, you split up to track down the missing concept, a “shaggy, four-legged beast with rather majestic horns.”

You eventually find the io, and Kleon shares his plans for the creature's place in the world. Unfortunately, however, Alkaios is forced to point out that although the beast is indeed physically powerful, it lacks the traits necessary to become a dominant hunter. Noting the io's tendency towards nutritional deficiency, the observer requests that you administer its scheduled aetherial supplement.
The aetherial supplement appears to have been successfully absorbed by the io. You turn to see Kleon looking upon his creation, his face filled with bittersweet adoration...

Facing yet another recommendation to adjust his original concept, Kleon seems unwilling to abandon his dream of turning the io into an apex predator. A sudden hope lights up his features, and he looks to you─the worldly familiar─in search of inspiration...
objectives: Use the aetherial supplement on the io.

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: You've chosen to stay, then? Wonderful! I realize we've only just met, but I feel such a bond with you, Forename!

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: There is one more concept I need to finalize, and I could think of no other entity I would rather have at my side during these ever-so-worrisome evaluations...

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: You have my io somewhere nearby, don't you, Alkaios?

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: Yes. Maira keeps that one under her watchful eye, but I know the spot where it usually roams. Come along, we need to cross the stream here...

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Kleon certainly has taken a liking to you, hasn't he?

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: What a wonderfully unusual familiar you are...

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Hm? Well, that's strange.

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: Oh, I don't see my io anywhere...which seems impossible, considering how big she is.

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: How odd. This is where it usually spends the greater part of its days...

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Yes, she never strays far from this spot. Perhaps the scent of unfamiliar visitors has made her wary?

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Let's split up and try to find her─“her” being a shaggy, four-legged beast with rather majestic horns.

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: Albeit rarely, a creation will sometimes display unexpected behaviors. This is exactly why we conduct thorough evaluations here in Elpis before setting them loose upon the world.

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Come on out, girl! No one's going to harm you!

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: Am I considered an “unfamiliar visitor” now? <sigh> I always thought of myself as the father of my creations, but I suppose I will never be their true parent...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You find a shaggy, four-legged beast, and the horns really are rather majestic... This must be the io.

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: Ah, there she is, the naughty thing! Nicely tracked, Forename!

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Hello, my lovely. Come to Maira, now.

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Well, would you look at that. I think she's taken a liking to you, Forename.

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: And I see that Kleon has a liking for stout and stocky designs.

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: Yes! The heftier, the better! The io is one of my favorites─round and robust, and bristling with spiky protrusions! A truly powerful beast!

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: I envisioned her dominating any habitat she entered. What do you think?

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Ah, she's certainly an imposing specimen...

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: Its physical strength is readily apparent, yes, but more than muscle is needed to dominate a territory. The creature's field of vision is obscured by that mass of wiry hair and curling horns, preventing effective use of its natural weaponry.

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: In the wild, being unable to hunt and catch prey in a consistent manner culminates in a slow death by starvation. It is our recommendation that you redesign the io as a grass grazer and resubmit the concept as a candidate for livestock.

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: Livestock...

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: Unsurprisingly, the io here is susceptible to nutritional deficiencies, and we must administer regular aetherial supplements. As you appear to have gained its trust, would you mind doing the honors?

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: You needn't convince it to eat anything─simply splash the creature with this solution.

dialogue.name: ALKAIOS
dialogue.text: Supplemental aether is absolutely essential for such a poor hunter. We wouldn't want the io to collapse now, would we?

dialogue.name: MAIRA
dialogue.text: Such a good-natured creature...which is a large part of the problem, I'm afraid.

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: If I must change her into livestock to see her released into the world, then that is what I must do...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The aetherial supplement is absorbed into the io's body...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Although difficult to tell, you think the io looks somewhat healthier...

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: Thank you for tending to my creation, Forename.

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: My io would likely thrive as a livestock animal, but I did so dearly want her to become an apex predator...

dialogue.name: KLEON
dialogue.text: Oh! Maybe there's still hope! You have an eye for these things─could you offer any more of your insightful suggestions?
